name: Clicking Game (CrazyD4RKiller1)
description:
Clicking Game

This is just a clicker game I wanted to make since I was bored. I thought the game turned out alright. In this game you can click, buy upgrades and buy rebirths. If you enjoyed the game please let me know, also if you have any feedback please tell me. Also I'm new to C#! I made this game in Visual Studio 2019!
